modName: Revealing Bandit Armor  - male - AS edition
summary: Lite version of Bandit ( Fur ) Armor for males
descriptionHtml:
Revealing Bandit Armor - male - AS edition

Lite version of Bandit ( Fur ) Armor for males

This is an update for Sundracon\'s [url=file.php?id=2811]Revealing Nude Fur - Male[/url]
v2.0 features:
- HD texture
- fixed inner part of the skirt
- compatibilty with Nude Male with Import from Roberts new vegas male v1.5

These files contain adult-only content!



Requirements:
[url=file.php?id=3421]Nude Male with Import from Roberts new vegas male[/url] v1.5 or higher by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1630086]Sundracon[/url]
